text: Dmitriy Bessmertny (; ; born 3 January 1997) is a Belarusian footballer. As of 2019, he plays for BATE Borisov.Player's profile at FC Minsk website ==References== ==External links== * * *Profile at FC Minsk website Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Belarus international footballers Category:FC Minsk players Category:FC BATE Borisov players
